original_title: ParTy Boi: Black Diamonds in Ice Castles
overview: A documentary focusing on the effects of crystal meth addiction in LGBTQ communities of color. Featuring real stories of real people who are dealing with and surviving crystal meth addiction. A riveting film to captivate and bring awareness to all audiences and change the perception of the 'Party & Play' lifestyle within the inner city demographic of LGBTQ people of color.
title: ParTy Boi: Black Diamonds in Ice Castles
